title: Smart Data Models - GovSteamSGO
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified Steam turbine governor model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteamSGO

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. One/per unit regulation (K1). Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Upper power limit (Pmax). Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lower power limit (Pmin). Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller lead compensation (T2). Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Delay due to steam inlet volumes associated with steam chest and inlet piping (T4). Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reheater delay including hot and cold leads (T5). Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Delay due to IP-LP turbine, crossover pipes and LP end hoods (T6). Default: 0
